remarks: If two lattice elements covered by a third are comparable, then they are equal.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Jun-2012.)
statement:
cvrcmp.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvrcmp.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cvrcmp.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvrcmp2 $p |- ( ( K e. OP /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ ( X C Z /\ Y C Z ) ) -> ( X .<_ Y <-> X = Y ) ) $.
